categories: Performance Light Crew Neck Short Sleeve Base
description: When hot and sweaty isn't an option. This lightweight performance base layer tee has integrated ventilation throughout the arms and body to help keep you cool and move sweat away from your body. Plenty of stretch lets you reach and move freely.Made of moisture wicking polyester and nylon that breathes well and dries quickly.Elastane content stretches for unrestricted movement.Seamless mesh zones vent excess heat.Raglan sleeves allow full range of motion.
name: Odlo Performance Light Crew Neck Short Sleeve Base Layer - Women's
